title: Nasus is so stupid i'm actually considering not playing this game anymore. PLEASE NERF WOW.
body: I just wanted to bitch about Nasus, because I am so upset at Nasus snowballing every game, just without skill. By the time you beat the whole entire team after your top has fed, enter Nasus who get's an easy penta without event having to lift a finger. I hate this game.

replies.body: If only this game had %%%%tonnes of mobile champs and heaps of anti tank items, o wait it does pick a kite champ and build a last whisper then laugh at Nasus as he does %%%% all and nothing whilst you shred through him with your pen and kite with your mobility.

You just need to pick someone who isn't awful and run his face into Nasus from lvl 1 to 5, avoid building pure defensively and also avoid building aoe.

Or you can just get a ranged top cancer and instantly make the Nasus die of sever organ failures during loading screen, or better in champ select.

A champ with piss pore laning that excels extremely well late game... Considering how fast you can shred tanks nowadays I don't think he deserves to be touched. When they removed the bonus cast range on some abilities from ult that was fine enough. Seriously playing tanks use to bring me joy just by how fun being so endurable was but now you just get shredded by Vayne's etc.
